product_overview: Lyrcon DMS (Dealer Management System) is a comprehensive web application designed for automotive dealerships to manage vehicles, finance, and customer relationships efficiently. It centralizes inventory, sales, loan management, and CRM functions with advanced automation features such as VIN decoding and real-time sales forecasting.
core_goals: Streamline dealership operations by digitizing and automating manual workflows.
Centralize data management for inventory, finance, and customer inquiries.
Provide actionable insights and forecasting via interactive dashboards.
Enhance user experience with a premium UI supporting Dark/Light modes and fluid animations.
Ensure data integrity and operational reliability through robust backend and quality assurance automation.
key_features: Dashboard with real-time metrics, sales forecasting, and quick action shortcuts.
Unified Inventory Management handling new cars, used car purchases, and sales with document upload support.
Automated VIN decoding to reduce data entry errors and speed up inventory logging.
Finance & Loan Management tracking EMI schedules, disbursements, and protection plans.
Customer Relationship Management (CRM) with lead tracking and inquiry status workflows.
Mobile KYC workflow with step-by-step verification and camera integration for on-site validation.
RTO Management for tracking regional transport office processes.
User Management with role-based access control (Admin, Sales Executive, Field Agent).
File uploads for vehicle documentation handling multipart data submissions.
Comprehensive Authentication and Profile Management modules.
user_flow_summary: User registration followed by role-based login and session management.
Admin and Manager users access all modules including financial data and user settings.
Sales Executives manage inventory, inquiries, and sales transactions via the dashboard.
Field Agents perform Mobile KYC customer verification steps using mobile-optimized UI.
Inventory addition flow covering new vehicle entries, used car purchases with document uploads, and vehicle sales with auto-filled buyer information.
Finance module interactions to manage loans, EMI schedules, and financial records.
Interactive dashboard usage to monitor business metrics and forecast sales.
CRM user workflow managing leads from entry through conversion stages.
File upload process for vehicle-related documents during purchase or registration workflows.
validation_criteria: Successful user registration, authentication, and role-based authorization verified through automated Selenium tests.
Dashboard accurately displays real-time metrics and sales forecast charts under varying data loads.
VIN decoding feature correctly fetches and populates vehicle details for entered VINs.
Inventory module supports seamless addition, editing, and filtering of vehicles.
File uploads handle all document types without data loss or corruption.
Finance records including EMI and loan schedules are accurately recorded and retrievable.
Mobile KYC workflow functions end-to-end with camera integration and identity verification steps.
CRM lead status transitions operate smoothly according to defined workflows.
System performance and data consistency maintained during concurrent multi-user sessions.
End-to-end testing covers full purchase flow ensuring no transaction failures.
